records.note: Sheril is a 12-year-old african american female diagnosed with solid tumor in the nerve cells. She has secondary cancer.

Sheril is a 12-year-old african american female diagnosed with neuroblastoma. Neuroblastoma is a solid cancerous tumor that begins in the nerve cells outside the brain of infants and young children. It can start in the nerve tissue near the spine in the neck, chest, abdomen, or pelvis, but it most often begins in the adrenal glands. The adrenal glands are located on top of both kidneys and make hormones that help control body functions, such as heart rate and blood pressure.
Sheril is a 12-year-old african american female diagnosed with solid tumor in the nerve cells.
Sheril is a 12-year-old black female diagnosed with Neuroblastoma.
She has had problems in school.
